response.overview: One of the greatest goalscorer in the history of the Premiership, Alan Shearer realized his boyhood dream when he signed for Newcastle United in the summer of 1996. It is a reflection on a decade of goals, goals, goals and Shearer himself talks exclusively about his football life and looks back fondly on the many great years at the club.
response.tagline: Alan Shearer is one of the most iconic players to play the game in recent generations. This release takes an in-depth look at the man and the footballer and looks back at many memorable moments from his career.
response.title: Shearer The Legend
